improveItemPerformance.desc:: Improves item entiy performance, significantly reduing their overhead. default: true

highlightitems.desc:: Choose if nearby reported stacked item entities should be glowing, default: true

reportThreshold.desc:: Set the min amount of stacked items being reported, default: 100

autoremovethreshold.desc:: Set the amount of stacked items being automatically removed, default: 160

reportInterval.desc:: Set the amount of seconds between repeated notifications: default: 180

chatnotification.desc:: Set the chat notification type, one of these: PLAYER(closest player), EVERYONE(all players), NONE. default: PLAYER
